title: Semrush Subscription Plans Comparison
content:
Subscriptions

You can see on our Prices page that we have 3 levels of subscription: Pro, Guru, and Business. Pro is the basic subscription, Guru is the most popular for SMBs and growing agencies, and Business is the advanced option for agencies, E-commerce projects, and businesses with an extensive web presence. Subscriptions differ in the number of tools available as well as in the number of limits.

Subscription plans comparison

Here is the most general description of how subscriptions differ:

Pro 

	Guru	Business

Analyze Competitor's Strategy (keywords, ads, backlinks)
Keyword Research
Link Building
On-Page & Technical Optimization Insights
Project sharing
	

All in Pro plus:

Content Effectiveness Audit
Topic Research
Content Optimization on-the-go
Compare performance across different devices & locations
Detect and fix cannibalizing pages
Historical Data
Google Looker Studio integration
	

All in Guru plus:

API Access
PLA analytics
Crawl Large Websites (up to 100k pages)
Share of Voice metric
AMP pages audit

500 Keywords to track
100 000 Pages to crawl
10 000 Results per report
250 Keyword metrics updates per month
500 SEO Ideas Units
5 Scheduled PDF reports
	
15 Projects
1500 Keywords to track
300 000 Pages to crawl
30 000 Results per report
1000 Keyword metrics updates per month
800 SEO Ideas Units
20 Scheduled PDF reports
	
40 Projects
5000 Keywords to track
1000 000 Pages to crawl
50 000 Results per report
5000 Keyword metrics updates per month
2000 SEO Ideas Units
50 Scheduled PDF reports

Price

monthly subscription - $139.95/mo
annual subscription - $117.33/mo
	
monthly subscription - $249.95/mo
annual subscription - $208.33/mo
	
monthly subscription - $ 499.95/mo
annual subscription - $416.66/mo


You can find a deep comparison of subscriptions by limits in the Subscription Limits article.

Also, feel free to check out the articles dedicated to each of the subscription plans:

Managing Your Pro Account
Managing Your Guru Account
Managing Your Business Account
Trial subscription

We offer Pro and Guru for trial. You will:

Get familiar with the Semrush functionality better;
Analyze the number of available limits on your own experience;
Choose the right level of subscription. 

Test Semrush for 7 days free

You can easily cancel after the trial is over.

Please kindly note that you can use the option to get a free trial only once. All the following attempts will lead to the purchase of a monthly plan, and you will be charged accordingly.
 
Start discovering the diversity of our features with the Getting Started Guide.
